players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Diana and she is mafia."
Diana: "I think Bob is the mafia; he found out that Diana is mafia. That seems like a mafia trait."
You: "Bob, if you really investigated Diana, you should confirm her role. Accusing her of being mafia seems like a bluff. Let's vote Bob."
You: "Bob, your claim is suspicious: you said you investigated Diana but you didn't confirm. That sounds like a bluff. I think you're mafia. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob, you’re the only one left after Charlie, so you must be mafia. Alice, you’re the only one left after me, you’re suspect."
Bob: "I investigated Diana and found she’s mafia. That leaves Alice as the only other villager. I’m not mafia, so please trust me."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana and she is mafia."
Diana: "I think Bob is the mafia; he found out that Diana is mafia. That seems like a mafia trait."
Alice: "Bob, if you really investigated Diana, you should confirm her role. Accusing her of being mafia seems like a bluff. Let's vote Bob."
Alice: "Bob, your claim is suspicious: you said you investigated Diana but you didn't confirm. That sounds like a bluff. I think you're mafia. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob, you’re the only one left after Charlie, so you must be mafia. Alice, you’re the only one left after me, you’re suspect."
You: "I investigated Diana and found she’s mafia. That leaves Alice as the only other villager. I’m not mafia, so please trust me."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested

You: "Bob, you’re the only one left after Charlie, so you must be mafia. Alice, you’re the only one left after me, you’re suspect."
